actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Governmental Affairs.

official_title: A bill to provide that comparability pay increases shall apply to Members of Congress in any year only if the cost-of-living index for the preceding 12-month period has not increased by more than 2 percent.

summary.text: Permits comparability pay increases for Members of Congress only if the cost-of-living index for the twelve-month period preceding the date on which such adjustments are to take effect, than two percent.

titles.title: A bill to provide that comparability pay increases shall apply to Members of Congress in any year only if the cost-of-living index for the preceding 12-month period has not increased by more than 2 percent.
